entry.value: # WKT TO AC NODE%%00010def wkt_to_ac(wkt):%%00010 ac = (wkt%%00010 .replace('MULTIPOLYGON (((', '').replace(')))', '').replace(')), ((', '@')%%00010 .replace('POLYGON ((', '').replace('))', '').replace('), (', '@')%%00010 .replace(', ', ':').replace(' ', ',')%%00010 )%%00010 return ac%%00010%%00010# Copy input table and convert wkt to AC into new column%%00010output_table = input_table.copy()%%00010output_table['AC'] = input_table.wkt.apply(wkt_to_ac)
